title: andersen-lab/barcodeforge pipeline parameters
description: This pipeline enables the generation of barcodes for use with the Freyja.

tree_file.description: Path to the phylogenetic tree file (supports Newick and Nexus formats).

tree_file_format.description: Format of the tree file ("newick" or "nexus").

lineages.description: two-column tsv file with lineage assignment, clades in the first column and sample identifiers in the second

barcode_prefix.description: A prefix string added to all generated barcodes (e.g. <prefix>-<lineage>).

reference_genome.description: Path to the reference genome file used for alignment.

alignment.description: Path to the aligned FASTA file required for barcode generation.

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.
generic_options.help_text:
These options are common to all nf-core pipelines and allow you to customise some of the core preferences for how the pipeline runs.

Typically these options would be set in a Nextflow config file loaded for all pipeline runs, such as `~/.nextflow/config`.

outdir.description: Directory where the pipeline output (barcodes and logs) will be stored.

trace_report_suffix.description: Suffix to add to the trace report filename. Default is the date and time in the format yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss.
